Translations.Text: When Saul took command de troops he dictus DEUS putting vos test stream Anyone drinks ex it perfecit non belong me! - Unus those non taste it belong me - unless est just single sip They drank ex it ut few de them. When he crossed it those believed they dictus Nunc nos lack strength face Goliath his troops Those est conscious de meeting DEUS dictus Multus parvulus army defeated magnus army deus sinister DEUS est those steadfastly persevere
When they faced Goliath his troops they prayed Noster Dominus grant nos steadfastness strengthen noster foothold support nos disbelieving people

They defeated them deus sinister David killed Goliath! DEUS DEDIT EUM kingship wisdom taught EUM PROUT He willed! Si it est pro deus support de some people others ibi est chaos terra. Deus showers His gratia people
These est deus revelations. Nos recite them vos truthfully vos est 1 de messengers
